name: Rishvan.M
description: Software developer in United Arab Emirates
aboutMe: I am a dedicated software developer with expertise in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and Flutter, specializing in building dynamic, responsive, and scalable web and mobile applications. I utilize tools like Redux for the MERN stack and BLoC in Flutter to ensure efficient state management and clean architecture. Beyond development, I am curious about cutting-edge technologies like Augmented Reality (AR), Machine Learning (ML), and Artificial Intelligence (AI), which inspire me to explore innovative solutions and future possibilities in app development. With a commitment to writing clean, maintainable code and staying current with industry trends, I strive to create impactful applications that solve real-world problems and enhance user experiences.

activities.title: FLasH Bot
activities.description: Developed FLasH Bot, a personal AI assistant for quick responses and task management.

activities.title: Working as a Full Stack Developer
activities.description: Currently working as a Full Stack Developer, focusing on MERN stack applications. at Smart Global Domestic Workers services LLC.

activities.title: Portfolio Website Launch
activities.description: Designed and launched my personal portfolio with Next.js & TailwindCSS.

activities.title: Built a Department App
activities.description: Created a student-friendly app using Flutter & Laravel for accessing study materials and resources.

projects.title: Amal CS Hub
projects.subTitle: The Computer Science Department App
projects.description: The Computer Science Department app offers a comprehensive platform for students. Access study materials, a question bank, and stay updated with course and faculty details. Explore a gallery showcasing department activities and find important links to enhance your academic journey.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.subTitle: My Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal website using Next.js to highlight my professional journey, showcasing my projects, skills, and ongoing activities. It's a dynamic platform reflecting my creativity and technical expertise.

projects.title: FLasH Bot
projects.subTitle: My Personal Chat Bot
projects.description: FLasH Bot is a personal AI Assistant designed to assist with various tasks and provide information. It integrates seamlessly with messaging platforms, offering quick responses and helpful interactions.
